title: Potential Zilean "rework" ideas.
body:
I feel like his kit excels too much with good teammates and not enough with his own ability. If they are going to take a look at Zilean, they should make the champion more fun to play in general.

If Zilean can revive/speed/slow people with "Time abilities", rewind cooldowns, and instantly place bombs on peoples heads(??) there should be more to his abilities than click target and run. Giving allies experience is something that doesn't really fit into the game and relies heavily on your teams success in lane.

**Passive: **Whenever an ally is affected by Zileans spells, all of their cooldowns are decreased by 0.5 seconds. Whenever an enemy is affected by Zileans spells, their cooldowns are frozen for 0.25 seconds.

**Q: Warp Bomb: **Zilean creates a rift at a target location that implodes after 1 second. Enemies are displaced for a short duration. a/b/c/d/e damage.

**W: Rewind:** Zilean places a target champion back to the location they were at 0.5/.75/1/1.25/1.5 seconds ago. 
**WP**: Increases his passive effect by 0.1 per level.  

**E: Time Warp: **Zilean blinks in the direction of the mouse cursor and gains an 150 unit aura that speeds allies or slows enemies by a/b/c/d/e %

**R: Chronoshift:** Makes a target ally untargettable and stunned for 1 second, resets all of their cooldowns by 75%, and on Zileans next Time Warp within 5 seconds they are warped with him.  a/b/c cooldown.

Too OP? Maybe. But it just seemed like a really fun kit to play with.
